overview: We see a Rolls-Royce ride into the country, with a young orphan named Eva, accompanied by her uncle and aunt. They go to the man, she just married, but do not know yet. This man, Sir Remy, is a widower, surrounded by guests and staff lives in a castle, in the memory of his former wife, Mathilde, whose perfect doppelganger Eve.  He believes still smell Mathilde's perfume in his castle. Mathilde added Remy in the past torments to by all men gave himself who so wished. In order to avenge the memory of his late wife, he leaves the young Eve in a ceremony publicly humiliate. The innocent Eva proves to be a reincarnation of the late Mathilde.
title: The Scent of Mathilde
